title: Caribbean Living masthead
content:
If you can please identify the font used for the Caribbean Living masthead I would really appreciate it.

Thank you for your help,  
John

P.S. See my post about Art Basel Miami Beach: Wim Crouwel, Neville Brody, Chip Kidd, james victore, ext. will be their.
